a:
This is a bot that will play rock paper scissors with you
Press /scissors to show scissors
Press /rock to show rock
Press /paper to show paper
b:
Paper conquers stone (“paper wraps around stone”)
Stone defeats scissors (“stone dulls scissors”)
Scissors beat paper (“scissors cut paper”)
If the players show the same sign, then the game is considered a draw and the game is replayed.
For each victory you are awarded one point
And for every defeat to your enemy
Also, no one gets points for a draw.
After the game, the number of victories is displayed on the screen:
yours on the left - your computer on the right
